topic.label: Workbench - Navigating the user interface using the keyboard

context.description:
The R Console enables command based interaction with R.
You can type commands in the bottom text field and edit R code almost like in the R Editor. Using the UP- and DOWN-key you can navigate through the history of the last inputs. Pressing ENTER or the 'Submit'-Button sends your current input to R.
